description.narrative: To fund environmental impact study on the Tia Maria mining project, which will make two significant cuts through the Tambo Valley and reach the water table that feeds the Tambo River which is the principle water source for human consumption and farming irrigation in the area where 90% of the population relies on agricultural production for their livelihoods (accounts for the employment of around 15,000 people and is the source of income for 7,000 families, and feeds 20,000 people). The objective of this process is to bring attention to the public and local and national government officials by conducting expansive environmental impact study of the mining project and distribute results to relevant stakeholders. El Frente has to complete this study in the near future in order to move swiftly on preventing the mining project
